about_the_game:
This is a science fiction adventure game that stimulates fun. In the game, players will play a space explorer to explore the mystery of dinosaurs and build their own dinosaur kingdom.


The first stage:

Explore the right planet in space. Players need to find the planet suitable for living in space, choose a suitable position to land, and start exploring the mystery of this mysterious planet. In the process of exploration, players need to pay attention to safety and avoid being attacked by alien creatures.

The second stage:

capture dinosaurs on the planet for scientific research on the planet. In the process of exploration, players can find a variety of dinosaurs. By capturing and studying these dinosaurs, players can gain more scientific knowledge and improve their strength.

The third stage:

build a planting manor to feed dinosaurs. After mastering sufficient scientific knowledge, players can start building their own dinosaur estates and cultivate and feed dinosaurs. Through continuous investment and operation, players can get more resources and props to improve their strength.

The fourth stage:

command and train dinosaur to attack other wild dinosaurs and expand the territory. After establishing their own dinosaur kingdom, players can start attacking other wild dinosaur kingdoms to compete for more territories and resources. Through continuous training of dinosaurs and improve the strength of dinosaurs, players can achieve more victory.

Fifth stage:

driving a roller coaster to visit the forest land. At the last stage of the game, players can drive the roller coaster and patrol the forest land along the border of the dinosaur kingdom to find more dinosaurs and beautiful scenery.

In short, this is a creative and challenging game. It not only allows players to experience the wonderful and mysterious science fiction world, but also to exercise players' thinking and operation ability. Come join our ranks and start your dinosaur planet adventure!


Operation method:

Space control:

Turn the left handle left/right
Power -retrieved left handle, up/down
Accelerate (hold) right hand trigger
Hanging (holding) holding the right hand grip
Map menu

Shooting control:

Turn the left handle left/right
Power -retrieved left handle, up/down
Triggea of the right handle
Pause menu
Switch the firepower right handle grip key

Feeding control:

Turn the right handle left/right
Move to the right handle left/right
Move the left handle on the left handle/below
Various display menu
Cancel the right handle grip key

Fighting control:

Turn the right handle left/right
Move to the right handle left/right
Move the left handle on the left handle/below
Attack 1 right handle trigger
Attack 2 (not all) right handle downward

Roller coaster control:

Speed right handle left/right
Pause menu

name: VR Jurassic Adventure HD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support:

short_description: This is a science fiction adventure game that stimulates fun. In the game, players will play a space explorer to explore the mystery of dinosaurs and build their own dinosaur kingdom.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
